section.title: Configuring the Monitoring Service
section.para: The monitoring service, based on Monasca, allows you to configure an external SMTP server for email notifications when alarms trigger. You also have options for your alarm metrics database should you choose not to use the default option provided with the product.
In &productname; you have the option to specify a SMTP server for email notifications and a database platform you want to use for the metrics database. These steps will assist in this process.
